issue.title: Python: Auto-detect nested lists and nested numpy arrays in Pandas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently a user needs to specify an Arrow schema to indicate that a specific column has nested lists, while not simple we should add some auto-detection code for this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-575?focusedCommentId=16088140) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~xhochy]` can this move to 0.6.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-575?focusedCommentId=16088633) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~wesmckinn]` I'll take a shot at this now, I need it in the next release.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-575?focusedCommentId=16088728) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 847
